DOC.brief_summary: An open label, 2-period, sequential study to determine the impact of multiple doses of rifampin on single-dose pharmacokinetics of HCV-796
DOC.brief_title: Study to Determine the Impact of Multiple Doses of Rifampin on Single-dose Pharmacokinetics of HCV-796
DOC.criteria: Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of medical history, physical examination, clinical laboratory test results, vital signs, and 12lead electrocardiogram (ECG).
